Congratulations! You finished the challenge.

You faced seedy CSS wizards, firebreathing dragons and hell-raising hackers.

The internet Gods are kind to you today and have decided that you won.

Woo yeah congrats. Now leave me alone and get back to work.


This game is made with just HTML. No JavaScript, no CSS and no backend.

I should of put more effort into this, but tbh, this was a pain in the ass to make.

Maybe next time.
